meanings.definition: To introduce something new or make changes in something established.
meanings.sent1: She novates the traditional recipe by adding a secret ingredient.
meanings.sent2: The company novates its products regularly to keep up with market trends.
meanings.sent3: The chef novates the menu by serving ice cream with hot sauce.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity novates the dull office environment into a vibrant workspace.
meanings.sent5: The artist novates the canvas with bold strokes of color.

meanings.definition: To innovate or create something new.
meanings.sent1: He novates by designing a unique solution to the problem.
meanings.sent2: Scientists constantly novate to discover new technologies.
meanings.sent3: The inventor novates a machine that makes pancakes in different shapes.
meanings.sent4: Her imagination novates the story into a thrilling adventure.
meanings.sent5: The architect novates the building with sustainable materials.
